Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season. Google earned$ 2.5 billion, or$ 7.81

At the press conference, Stephen Elop outlined how the Microsoft partnership is good for Nokia. Then Stephen Elop delivered the understatement of 2011. We believe this partnership is also good for Microsoft. Let's assume that over the next three years Nokia's Symbian operating system largely gets replaced by Windows Phone 7. said David Letterman .`` Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said.`` I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.'' He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. ordeal, Michael Vick agreed to a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a company that produces protective padding for athletes.
